TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapDocumentMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapDocumentMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 將 套用於方法，指定往返於方法的 SOAP 訊息使用 格式。

span.span: Applying the to a method specifies that SOAP messages to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 定義的 SOAP 訊息中如何可以格式化 XML Web service 方法，它會呼叫作業，這兩種樣式：`RPC`和`Document`。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, which it calls an operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `Document` 是指設定格式化的 XML Web service 方法，根據 XSD 結構描述。`Document` refers to formatting the XML Web service method according to an XSD schema. `Document`樣式是指格式化`Body`項目，以遵循的一或多個訊息部分的一系列`Body`項目。The `Document` style refers to formatting the `Body` element as a series of one or more message parts following the `Body` element. 確切方式個別的訊息部分取決於和屬性。Exactly how the individual message parts is determined by the and properties. 屬性會決定參數是否格式化`Encoded`或`Literal`。The property determines whether parameters are formatted `Encoded` or `Literal`. 判斷參數是否封裝於單一訊息部分下列`Body`項目，或每個參數是否個別訊息部分。The determines whether the parameters are encapsulated within a single message part following the `Body` element or whether each parameter is an individual message part. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂 SOAP 訊息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). 這個屬性可以套用至 XML Web service 方法，在伺服器上的和用戶端上的 proxy 類別的方法。This attribute can be applied to both an XML Web service method on the server and a method of the proxy class on the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將訊息樣式設定為`Document`針對`GetUserName`XML Web service 方法。The following code example sets the message style to `Document` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method. 此外，具有的 XML 項目`Body`SOAP 要求和 SOAP 回應的項目會設定為`GetUserNameRequest`和`GetUserNameResponse`分別。Additionally, the XML element with the `Body` element for the SOAP request and SOAP response are set to `GetUserNameRequest` and `GetUserNameResponse`, respectively.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 要求的 HTTP 標頭欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 要求的 HTTP 標頭欄位。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 預設值是http://tempuri.org/MethodName，而 MethodName 是 XML Web service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName, where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，屬性會指出要求的目的 URI。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the request. 不過，SOAP 規格格式的 URI，將沒有限制，或任何規則的 URI 是可解析。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format of the URI, or any rules about whether the URI is resolvable. 目前狀態和內容屬性可以由 Web 伺服器，例如防火牆、 用來適當地篩選 http SOAP 要求訊息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers, such as firewalls, to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 根據預設，.NET Framework 1.1 版發行中的屬性`soapAction`屬性`soap:operation`為 XML Web service 產生的 WSDL 文件中支援 SOAP 繫結的每個項目。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 如需有關 SOAP 規格的詳細資訊，請參閱 W3C 網站 (http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP)。For more information on the SOAP specification, see the W3C Web site (http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/GetUserName`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定繫結，XML Web Service 方法為其實作作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: 繫結，XML Web Service 方法為其實作作業。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for.

value.span: 預設為附有 SOAP 的 XML Web Service 名稱。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結所定義的 「 Web 服務描述語言 」 (WSDL) 是類似於介面，因為它會定義一組具體的作業。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 對於使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務，每個 XML Web service 方法會是繫結內的作業。With respect to XML Web services created using ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web 服務方法都是 XML Web service 的預設繫結或繫結中指定的成員套用至 XML Web service。XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. XML Web service 可以實作多個繫結時多個屬性套用至 XML Web service。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings when multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 一次一或多個屬性套用至 XML Web service，或可以套用至個別的 XML Web 服務方法，以指出特定的 XML Web service 方法所實作的繫結作業。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 設定的屬性或來指定繫結，XML Web service 方法實作的作業。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for. 只有一個或可以套用至 XML Web service 方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，對 XML Web service 方法只能實作一種繫結的作業。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. 如需有關 WSDL 規格的詳細資訊，請參閱 W3C 網站 (http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl)。For more information on the WSDL specification, see the W3C Web site (http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OneWay : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 用戶端是否等候 Web 伺服器完成處理 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web Service 用戶端不等候 Web 伺服器以完成處理 XML Web Service 方法，則為 。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 XML Web service 方法具有屬性設定為`true`，XML Web service 用戶端不需要等候 Web 伺服器完成處理 XML Web service 方法。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. 只要 Web 伺服器已還原序列化，但是叫用 XML Web 服務方法之前，伺服器會傳回 HTTP 202 狀態碼。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before invoking the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 狀態碼會向用戶端指出 Web 伺服器已開始處理訊息。A HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，將 XML Web service 用戶端會收到任何 Web 伺服器已成功處理訊息的通知。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 單向方法不能有傳回值，或任何 out 參數。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. 如果您使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版 XML Web 服務方法有或屬性套用至它們屬性設為`true`，並沒有存取其使用靜態屬性。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property of set to `true`, do not have access to their using the static property. 若要存取，衍生類別實作 XML Web service 方法，從並存取屬性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是不需要等候完成 XML Web service 方法的用戶端對 XML Web service 方法。The following code example is an XML Web service method that does not require the client to wait for the XML Web service method to complete. 因此，範例會設定屬性設`true`。Therefore, the sample sets the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapParameterStyle ParameterStyle { System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapParameterStyle get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapParameterStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數是否封裝於 SOAP 訊息之 XML 部分中 項目之下的單一 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element beneath the element in the XML portion of a SOAP message.

value.span: SOAP 訊息的 傳送往返於 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: The for SOAP messages sent to and from an XML Web service method.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓您指定傳送 SOAP 訊息中的參數傳送進出`PlaceOrder`XML Web service 方法不會封裝在一個 XML 項目。The following code example specifies that parameters sent in the SOAP messages sent to and from the `PlaceOrder` XML Web service method are not encapsulated within one XML element.

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 方法與 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目，這是定義於服務描述來當做一個作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in a service description as an operation.

value.span: XML Web Service 方法與 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目，這是定義於服務描述來當做一個作業。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method, which is defined in an service description as an operation.

value.span: 預設值為 XML Web Service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會定義用來包裝下方參數的 XML 項目`Body`元素的 soap 要求時是。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP request when is . 這會反映在 XSD 結構描述中表示 XML Web service 的服務描述中的 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 要求。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP request to the XML Web service method within the service description for an XML Web service. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定的 SOAP 要求中的 XML Web service 方法相關聯的 XML 項目名稱`MyCustomElement`。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP request to `MyCustomElement`.

The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在 XSD 結構描述的 XML Web service 方法，其服務描述內。 is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method within its service description. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

summary.span: 取得或設定與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 回應關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 與 XML Web Service 方法之 SOAP 要求關聯的 XML 項目。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 預設值為 WebServiceNameResult，其中 WebServiceName 是 XML Web Service 方法的名稱。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會定義用來包裝下方參數的 XML 項目`Body`SOAP 回應的項目時是。The defines the XML element used to wrap the parameters beneath the `Body` element of the SOAP response when is . 這會反映在 XSD 結構描述代表內 XML Web service 的服務描述 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 回應中。This is reflected in the XSD schema representing the SOAP response to the XML Web service method within the XML Web service's service description. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定的 SOAP 回應中的 XML Web service 方法相關聯的 XML 項目名稱`MyCustomResponseElement`。The following code example sets the name of the XML element associated with the XML Web service method in the SOAP response to `MyCustomResponseElement`.

The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在 XSD 結構描述用於 XML Web service 方法，其服務描述中。The property is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method in its service description. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`http://www.contoso.com`。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息的 XML 部分內 XML Web Service 方法的參數格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter formatting for an XML Web service method within the XML portion of a SOAP message.
The for the XML Web service method.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 定義格式化參數的兩個方法：和。The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two methods for formatting parameters: and . 是指 SOAP 規格第 5 節所述的格式使用 SOAP 編碼的參數。 refers to formatting parameters using SOAP encoding, as outlined in the SOAP specification in section 5. 是指格式使用預先定義的 XSD 結構描述每個參數的參數。 refers to formatting the parameters using a pre-defined XSD schema for each parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂 SOAP 訊息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會指定`Document` / `Encoded` SOAP 訊息必須傳送至`PlaceOrder`XML Web service 方法。The following code example specifies that `Document` / `Encoded` SOAP messages must be sent to the `PlaceOrder` XML Web service method.

span.span: Customizing SOAP Message Formatting
